txt_en: You can start all over. Everybody gets a second chance. Happy new year!
txt_cn: 新的一年，每个人都能拥有新的开始与机遇，新年快乐！

txt_en: You want to be with someone who appreciates you for what you are.
txt_cn: 你选择的人，应该发自内心地欣赏你。

txt_en: Every man has his breaking point.
Falling in love with you was the easiest thing I have ever done.
txt_cn: 爱上你，是我此生做过最容易的事。

txt_en: For what it's worth, it's never too late.
txt_cn: 只要是有意义的事，多晚去做都不迟。
